attributes.action: Allow small funds to be given to children under the age of sixteen by government
attributes.additional_details: If the government were to fund young people with small amounts of money then children would be able to afford basic equipment for hobbies such as cooking.
attributes.background: Many children across the UK aspire to be great people when they grow up. What better way to begin your career than practice and gain experience when young. Sometimes you can get work experience in an area. Sometimes though this may not possible, so you may have to get some equipment at home.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by "small funds". We're also not sure in what circumstances you would want the Government to give these funds to children.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. We'd be happy to help you if you email us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk
